position.marginalia_text: Convertibilitas

marginalia.translation: Convertibility.

position.marginalia_text: Vniversalis affirmatiua simpliciter co[n]versa r[ati]o[n]e materia[e] supra

marginalia.translation: A universal affirmative is converted simply by reason of matter.

position.marginalia_text: Potissima demonstratio

marginalia.translation: The most powerful demonstration.

position.marginalia_text: Vnu[m] mediu[m] ad vnam co[n]clusione[m]

marginalia.translation: One medium to one conclusion.

marginalia.anchor_text: no[n] augent[ur] p[er] diuersa media ad demonstrandu[m]

position.marginalia_text: Potissima demo[n]stratio no[n] p[otes]t augeri p[er] plura media.

marginalia.translation: The most powerful demonstration cannot be exalted by several methods.

position.marginalia_text: Convertibilitas.

marginalia.translation: Convertibility.

position.marginalia_text: Ergo apud mathematicos est illa demo[n]stratio potissima: q[uo]nia[m] ha[e]c, in illa ta[n]tum eveniu[n]t.

marginalia.translation: According to the mathematicians this demonstration is the most powerful because these [things] appear only in this.

marginalia.anchor_text: Omnis linea opposita dyametro [et] costa orthogonij est potencialit[er]

position.marginalia_text: O[mn]is linea op[posita] diam[etro] et cost[a] orth[ogonij] est pot[encialiter]

marginalia.translation: Every line opposite the diameter and side of a orthogonal [shape] are potential.

marginalia.anchor_text: om[n]is dyameter cubi est linea opposita dyametro [et] costa orthogonij

position.marginalia_text: O[mn]is diam[eter] cubi est lin[ea] op[posita] dia[metro] et cost[a] orth[ogonij]

marginalia.translation: Every diameter of a cube is a line opposite to the diameter and the side of an orthogonal [shape].

marginalia.anchor_text: Ergo om[n]is dyameter cubi tripla est potencialit[er] ad costam q[ua]drati

position.marginalia_text: O[mn]is ergo diameter cub[i] tripla est pot[entialiter] ad cost[am] [quadrati]

marginalia.translation: Therefore every diameter of a cube stands in triple exponentiation to the side of a [square].

position.marginalia_text: Conversio minoris in secunda [figura]

marginalia.translation: A conversion of the smaller in the second figure.

marginalia.anchor_text: Om[n]is dyameter cubi potencialit[er] tripla est ad costa[m] q[ua]drati

position.marginalia_text: O[mn]is di[ameter] cu[bi] pot[entialiter] tripla est ad costa[m] q[ua]drati

marginalia.translation: Every diameter of a cube stands in triple exponentiation to the side of a square.

marginalia.anchor_text: omnis linea opposita dyametro [et] costa orthogonij est potencialiter tripla ad costa[m] q[ua]drati

position.marginalia_text: O[mn]is linea op[posita] di[ametro] et cos[ta] or[thogonii] est pot[entialiter] tri[pla] ad co[stam] [quadrati]

marginalia.translation: Every line opposite to the diameter and the side of an orthogonal [shape] potentially stands in triple exponentiation to the side of a square.

marginalia.anchor_text: Ergo o[mn]is linea opposita dyametro et costa orthogonij est dyameter cubi

position.marginalia_text: O[mn]is ergo li[nea] op[posita] di[ametro] et co[sta] ort[hogenii] est dia[meter] cubi

marginalia.translation: Therefore every line opposite to the diameter and the side of an orthogonal [shape] is the diameter of the cube.

position.marginalia_text: Conversio maioris in nulla fig[ura]

marginalia.translation: The conversion of the greater in no figure.

marginalia.anchor_text: Om[n]is linea opposita dyametro et costa orthogonij est dyamet[er] cubi

position.marginalia_text: O[mn]is linea op[posita] di[ametro] et co[sta] or[thogenii] est diameter cubi

marginalia.translation: Every line opposite to the diameter and the side of an orthogonal [shape] is the diameter of the cube.

marginalia.anchor_text: o[mn]is dyameter cubi est potencialiter tripla ad costa[m] q[ua]drati

position.marginalia_text: O[mn]is di[ameter] cubi est pot[entialiter] tripla ad costa[m] □

marginalia.translation: Every diameter of the cube potentially stands in triple exponentiation to the side of a square.

marginalia.anchor_text: Ergo o[mn]e triplu[m] pote[n]cialit[er] ad costa[m] quadrati est linea opposita dyametro [et] costa orthogonij

position.marginalia_text: O[mn]e ergo triplu[m] pot[entialiter] ad costa[m] □, est li[nea] op[posita] di[ametro] et co[sta] or[thogonii]

marginalia.translation: Therefore everything that [stands] in triple exponentiation to the side of a square, is the line opposite to the diameter and the side of an orthogonal [shape].

position.marginalia_text: Determinata principia in demo[n]stratiuis scientijs

marginalia.translation: Determined principles in demonstrative sciences.

position.marginalia_text: Diuersa media

marginalia.translation: Different media.

marginalia.anchor_text: vni[us] rei est solu[m]m[od]o vna causa ade[ua]ta [et] p[ro]pria

position.marginalia_text: Vnius rei vna ta[n]tu[m] causa adequata et p[ro]pria.

marginalia.translation: The adequate and real reason for only one thing.

position.marginalia_text: nam

marginalia.translation: For.

underline.text: Om[n]is linea opposita dyametro et costa orthogonij
maioris q[ua]re cu[m] in doctrinalib[us] siue demonstratiuis no[n] possumus decipi arguendo ex affirmatiuis p[ro]pter co[n]uertibilitate[m] terminoru[m] in s[e]c[un]da figura. min[us] etia[m]
in potissima e[ni]m demo[n]stratio[n]e o[mn]es termini sunt conuertibiles quare
terminoru[m] q[ue] co[n]uertibilitas accipit diffinitio[n]es [et] ea q[uae] sunt p[er] se
non accidit ei deceptio q[ue] arguit in materia c[on]uertibili [et] i[n] tali argume[n]tatio[n]e
arguu[n]t ex causa eq[ua]ta non e[ni]m habent nisi vnu[m] mediu[m] ad vna[m] co[n]clusione[m]
equata de necessitate co[n]uertit[ur] cu[m] suo causato [et]
rationes demonstratiue no[n] augent[ur] p[er] diuersa media ad demonstrandu[m]
hec e[ni]m no[n] fit in potissima demo[n]stratio[n]e p[ro]pter quid
ergo vni[us] rei est solu[m]m[od]o vna causa adeq[ua]ta
